doesn't work for me too. i'm on a win xp 2.20 ghz cpu, 256mb intel chipset ram, directx 10 xp version installed. i installed all 3 executables from the torrent. well, i downloaded it for a friend who is on win7, but at the moment i don't have the ability to try it on an another pc. when i start the game, the loading screen shows correctly, and then sometimes it just crashez, or some kind of vertical characters show up, i think that it is the menu, and it does not load correctly. pls help me

i think your RAM memory is the problem
my laptop have 
1.91 ghz
256ram
and the game doesnt work

you need to have more than 256 ram
sorry!
my ram is 1gb, and only my video ram is 256mb... and it's enough for the system requirements. is it still the problem?

otherwise, the installer is beautiful, i love that i wont have to find maps for myself on the internet... this is exactly what i was looking for, cos i'll throw a lanparty, and it's always a lot of time to select some enjoyable games and maps or to make them myself. thanks a lot.

i thank you for downloading my game 
but i dont know why the game doesnt play

i have 
amd athlon le-1640 2.70 ghz
ram 1.89 gigs
and my video ram is 700mb 
and the game works perfectly

i have graphics card ATI Redeon 2100

tell me please you have  ATI OR Nvidia!!
well, i do not have a video card. it's an integrated video chipset on my mobo. ssooooo that could be the problem. maybe.

i can't detect how much ram does it have, but when i installed the directx the log said 250mb it think, but not for sure. but not this pc is the problem, i have got a way better computer, it's just not near. we with some friends want to play it on lan, and one of them has got only a laptop. it is a hp 530, and it hasn't got an AGP video card, it's chipset too. can you tel me, that will it run the game?

i found information for HP 530 and the laptop can run the game 

you can see the full information here:

http://h18000.www1.hp.com/products/quickspecs/12722_na/12722_na.PDF

thnx again for downloading!!
